odktools 0.1.0
  • Reference

odktools: Open Data Kit API client in R

Open Data Kit (ODK) is an open-source suite of tools that helps in authoring, collecting, and managing mobile data collection solutions. This package provides an ODK API client in R.

Installation

You can install the development version of odktools from GitHub with:

if(!require(remotes)) install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("rapidsurveys/odktools")

Usage
